actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude payments under the conservation reserve program from net earnings from self-employment.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from self-employment net income certain conservation reserve program payments.Amends the Social Security Act to exclude such payments from the definition of "net earnings from self-employment."

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude payments under the conservation reserve program from net earnings from self-employment.
